## Workshop Plan

Presentation in the morning, hands-on sessions on practical operational topics in the afternoon

- Day 1 - Basics of R

- Day 2 - R for Surveys

- Day 3 - R for Reporting

- Day 4 - R for Processes


## Day 1 Morning - Basics of R

 - An introduction to [Analysis Reproducibility](https://unhcr-americas.github.io/reproducibility/index.html)

 - [Data Manipulation and Visualization](https://vidonne.github.io/unhcrpractice/workshop/2022-11-dvt-budapest/dataviz_with_r_unhcrthemes.html) - using [{refugees}](https://populationstatistics.github.io/refugees/) & [{unchrthemes}](https://unhcr-dataviz.github.io/unhcrthemes/)
 
 - Building functions: An overview of [{unhcrplot}](https://edouard-legoupil.github.io/unhcrdatapackage/)
 
 - Accessing data API: [{robotoolbox}](https://dickoa.gitlab.io/robotoolbox/), [{riddle}](https://edouard-legoupil.github.io/riddle/), [{rhdx}](http://dickoa.gitlab.io/rhdx/), [{popdata}](https://edouard-legoupil.github.io/popdata/)
 

# Afternoon 1 - Hands-on {.slide-blue}

Hands on session - using official Statistics to build charts
 

## Day 2  Morning - R for Surveys

 - Kobo Survey Management with [{HighFrequencyChecks}](https://edouard-legoupil.github.io/HighFrequencyChecks/) 
 
 - Kobo survey [Data Exploration](https://edouard-legoupil.github.io/kobocruncher/tutorial/00-Intro.html#1) with [{KoboCruncher}](https://edouard-legoupil.github.io/kobocruncher)
 
 - Indicator calculation for RMS with [{IndicatorCalc}](https://unhcr-americas.github.io/IndicatorCalc/)
 

# Afternoon 2 - Hands-on {.slide-blue}

Working on UNHCR recent household survey dataset 
 
 
## Day 3 Morning -  R for Reporting
 
 - Reporting with [{unhcrdown}](https://unhcr-dataviz.github.io/unhcrdown/) and Posit Connect: An example with weekly report 
 
 - [Tips](https://github.com/vidonne/r-tips#tips) and Collaborative report building under version control with github. 
 

# Afternoon 3 - Hands-on {.slide-blue}

Developing a presentation from a survey

Facilitating Data Interpretation


## Day 4 Morning -  R for Processes 
 
 - Package building & Shiny __Companion App__ creation with [{Graveler}](https://edouard-legoupil.github.io/graveler/) 
 
 - Building [Severity index](https://rstudio.unhcr.org/SeverityIndex/): an overview of [{A2SIT}](https://unhcr-guatemala.github.io/A2SIT/)
 
  

# Afternoon 4 - Hands-on {.slide-blue}

Organizing data for severity index
